The `GCTrigger` class is defined after the `ConnectionRepository` class within the same document. The class is minimal, consisting only of a pass statement and a comment indicating that it is "used to trigger garbage collection." This suggests that the class may serve as a placeholder or signal for initiating garbage collection processes in other parts of the codebase, though no specific implementation details are provided in this chunk.

class GCTrigger:
